description: This file defines a React component 'ImportIssuesDialog' that provides a user interface for importing issues into Jira from a CSV or Excel file. It includes functionalities for selecting a project, downloading a project-specific CSV template, uploading a file, and handling the import process with appropriate UI feedback.

methods.name: handleFileChange
methods.description: Handles the change event for the file input, validating the selected file type and updating state accordingly.

methods.name: handleDownloadTemplate
methods.description: Generates and triggers download of a project-specific CSV template for issue import.

methods.name: resetState
methods.description: Resets component state to initial values.

methods.name: handleClose
methods.description: Closes the dialog and resets the component state.

methods.name: handleImport
methods.description: Handles the import process by sending the selected file and project info to the backend API.
